channel.title: Radium-X Full Release! -VPS Hosted- Dedicated Developers- Growing Active Communi
channel.description:
I would like to first introduce myself as an administrative representative of Radium-X. We are a new server with an experienced staff team. We are a revolution of Tronithium (aka Fabecraft). Our server has immeasurable potential, the only component missing is more players, so come join our family! We live and die by our 24/7 up time, no lag services. What do you have to lose!?
[SIZE=7][url=http://radium-x.com/]http://radium-x.com/[/url][/SIZE] [SIZE=7][url=http://radium-x.com/forums/]http://radium-x.com/forums/[/url] [/SIZE] - Custom Capes, Rares, and misc. Weapons
[URL=http://s1306.photobucket.com/user/justin15681/media/radium-xcustoms_zps69016cf0.png.html][IMG]http://i1306.photobucket.com/albums/s572/justin15681/radium-xcustoms_zps69016cf0.png[/img][/URL] - Active knowledgeable staff with years of experience
- Working Downloadable Client and Webhost Client
- All Skills work! With capes and emotes.
[SIZE=5]- Working bosses include:[/SIZE] • Nex • Tormented Demons • King Black Dragon • Corporal Beast • GodWars • Kalphite Queen • Avatar of Destruction • Sea Troll Queen • Giant Snake • Barrel Chest - And many more...
- Consistent Drop Rates
- Constantly growing economy and player base
- Custom Shop(s) [URL=http://s1306.photobucket.com/user/justin15681/media/Radium-xshops_zpsd502c1bf.png.html][IMG]http://i1306.photobucket.com/albums/s572/justin15681/Radium-xshops_zpsd502c1bf.png[/img][/URL]
- Custom Donator Zone
- Server restarts every 2 hours to minimize lag (restart takes 20 seconds)
- 24/7 Uptime
- Completionst Cape
- Full Summoning Abilities with BoB
- Active Forum Community
- Working High Scores
[SIZE=5]- Working Minigames Include:[/SIZE]
• Barrows • Pest Control • Fire/Kiln Cape • Working Duel Arena • Barbarian Assault • Party Room • Warriors Guild • Hunters Strike (A custom Mini Game) • Clan Wars and Castle Wars coming Soon
[URL=http://s1306.photobucket.com/user/justin15681/media/Partyroom_zpsc45c45c2.png.html][IMG]http://i1306.photobucket.com/albums/s572/justin15681/Partyroom_zpsc45c45c2.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s1306.photobucket.com/user/justin15681/media/BarrowsRadium-x_zpsef4e8302.png.html][IMG]http://i1306.photobucket.com/albums/s572/justin15681/BarrowsRadium-x_zpsef4e8302.png[/img][/URL]
- Active Real Pk and Fun Pk
- Custom Perfected Combat System
- Dragon Claws
- Perfect Spec System
- Great skilling and PVM (an all around Server)
- Custom quests
- And much More!
[SIZE=7][url=http://radium-x.com/]http://radium-x.com/[/url][/SIZE]

item.description:
@Radium-x_RSPS wrote:

I would like to first introduce myself as an administrative representative of Radium-X.
We are a new server with an experienced staff team. We are a revolution of Tronithium (aka Fabecraft). Our server has immeasurable potential, the only component missing is more players, so come join our family! We live and die by our 24/7 up time, no lag services. What do you have to lose!?

[SIZE=7]http://radium-x.com/[/SIZE]
